name: Five nights at... uh.. what?
description:
A simple FNAF - Based shooter where you fight bonnie in a space ship.

Controls - 

WASD to move.

Space to shoot, mouse to aim.

Avoid attacks!

Credits:

Sounds by Scott Cawthon and Toby Fox

Purple Guy sprite by Scott Cawthon

Other sprites by Me

Music by Scott Cawthon

Inspiration - Foxy fighters, and DSaF
